protein.specific_function: Component of the microsomal signal peptidase complex which removes signal peptides from nascent proteins as they are translocated into the lumen of the endoplasmic reticulum

reference.reference_text: Kalies KU, Hartmann E: Membrane topology of the 12- and the 25-kDa subunits of the mammalian signal peptidase complex. J Biol Chem. 1996 Feb 16;271(7):3925-9.
